column1: Little Goat Diner////As you'll come to find
column2: one of the types of cuisines that excites me the most is Asian fusion!  Fusions inspire culinary creativity
column3: and that makes my blood rush! Little Goat did it again with this twist on breakfast. "This Little Piggy Went to China" (sesame cheddar biscuit. sunny eggs. Szechuan pork sausage. chili garlic chive sauce. blackberries.) Different ingredients married together to create this fun play on the traditional eggs
column5: and biscuit dish.  Blackberries? (Shrugs) It worked.  Nothing boring here.
